title: Spacious apartment in the city center
description: Modern apartment with an area of 80m2 overlooking the city panorama. It consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, and a bathroom. Fully furnished and equipped.

title: Single-family house with a large garden
description: Spacious single-family house with a beautiful 1200m2 garden. It has 4 bedrooms, a large living room, an office, 2 bathrooms, and a garage for two cars.

title: Luxurious villa by the sea
description: Elegant villa located by the sea with a private beach and pool. It has 6 bedrooms, a large living room with a fireplace, a kitchen, an office, a gym, and a sauna.

title: Apartment in a building with a pool
description: Apartment with an area of 60m2 in a modern building with a pool and gym. It has 2 bedrooms, a living room with a kitchenette, a bathroom, and a balcony overlooking the city panorama.

title: Duplex apartment in the city center
description: Modern two-level apartment with an area of 100m2 located in the heart of the city. It consists of 3 bedrooms, a spacious living room, a kitchen, and 2 bathrooms.

title: Cozy apartment in a tenement house
description: Charming apartment with an area of 50m2 in a restored tenement house. It has a bedroom, a living room with a kitchenette, and a bathroom. Perfect for a single person or a couple.

title: Apartment with mountain view
description: Comfortable apartment with a terrace and a view of the mountains. It has 2 bedrooms, a living room with a fireplace, a kitchen, and a bathroom. Located in a quiet area.

title: House in the countryside with a large plot
description: Traditional house in the countryside with a large plot. It has 3 bedrooms, a spacious living room, a kitchen, an office, and two bathrooms. Ideal for a family or those seeking peace and quiet.

title: Apartment on the beach
description: Modern apartment located directly on the beach. It has 2 bedrooms, a living room with a kitchenette, a bathroom, and a terrace with a sea view.

title: Luxury villa in the mountains
description: Wonderful villa with a pool and garden among the mountain peaks. It has 5 bedrooms, a spacious living room with a fireplace, a kitchen, an office, and a gym.

title: Apartment in a historic building
description: Spacious apartment with an area of 70m2 in a historic 19th-century building. It has 2 bedrooms, a living room with a fireplace, a kitchen, and a bathroom.

title: Apartment in a prestigious location
description: Exclusive apartment in the heart of the city, just a few steps from the main square. It has 2 bedrooms, a spacious living room, a kitchen, and a bathroom.
